title: [Bug]: teams-for-linux 2.0.17 does not start
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

teams-for-linux core dumps when starting after upgrading to 2.0.17

### What package are you using?

rpm

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
I'm running Fedora 41 on wyland.

upgraded teams-for-linux to 2.0.17 from 2.0.14

now teams-for-linux is not starting


$ teams-for-linux 
No config file found, using default values
Initialising logger with config: {"transports":{"console":{"level":"info"},"file":{"level":false}}}
22:22:49.345 › configPath: /home/agangada/.config/teams-for-linux
22:22:49.347 › Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
22:22:49.457 › (node:7246) [DEP0180] DeprecationWarning: fs.Stats constructor is deprecated.
(Use `teams-for-linux --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)

(process:7246): Gtk-ERROR **: 22:22:49.476: GTK 2/3 symbols detected. Using GTK 2/3 and GTK 4 in the same process is not supported
Trace/breakpoint trap (core dumped)



$ teams-for-linux --trace-deprecation
No config file found, using default values
Initialising logger with config: {"transports":{"console":{"level":"info"},"file":{"level":false}}}
22:22:56.472 › configPath: /home/agangada/.config/teams-for-linux
22:22:56.474 › Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
22:22:56.576 › (node:7381) [DEP0180] DeprecationWarning: fs.Stats constructor is deprecated.
    at asarStatsToFsStats (node:electron/js2c/node_init:2:1748)
    at t.lstatSync (node:electron/js2c/node_init:2:4830)
    at t.statSync (node:electron/js2c/node_init:2:5392)
    at module.exports [as findUp] (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/escalade/sync/index.js:6:19)
    at [pkgUp] (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/yargs/build/index.cjs:1:48105)
    at [guessVersion] (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/yargs/build/index.cjs:1:47676)
    at te.version (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/yargs/build/index.cjs:1:44679)
    at ue.Yargs (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/yargs/build/index.cjs:1:62063)
    at Argv (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/yargs/index.cjs:12:16)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/node_modules/yargs/index.cjs:7:1)

(process:7381): Gtk-ERROR **: 22:22:56.592: GTK 2/3 symbols detected. Using GTK 2/3 and GTK 4 in the same process is not supported
Trace/breakpoint trap (core dumped)
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
$ teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
No config file found, using default values
Initialising logger with config: "{}"
22:45:27.196 › File logging at /home/agangada/.config/teams-for-linux/logs/main.log with level silly
22:45:27.198 › Console logging enabled with level silly
22:45:27.198 › Logger initialised
22:45:27.198 › configPath: /home/agangada/.config/teams-for-linux
22:45:27.198 › configFile: {}
22:45:27.200 › Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
22:45:27.307 › (node:9272) [DEP0180] DeprecationWarning: fs.Stats constructor is deprecated.
(Use `teams-for-linux --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)

(process:9272): Gtk-ERROR **: 22:45:27.328: GTK 2/3 symbols detected. Using GTK 2/3 and GTK 4 in the same process is not supported
Trace/breakpoint trap (core dumped)
```

### Additional context

_No response_
